      • textFieldsAction

        public void textFieldsAction()
                      throws EmptyFieldException,
                             UsedName
        This method reads text from text fields. After successful reading array list of customer will be serialized.
        Throws:
        EmptyFieldException - Empty field exception means that user does not fulfill every text field (My own exception).
        UsedName - Used name exception means that user name is already used (my own exception).

      • checkPassword

        public void checkPassword()
                   throws NotSamePasswordException
        Method checks if user enters same confirm password.
        Throws:
        NotSamePasswordException - Not same Password exception means that the user does not enter same passwords (my own exception).
